creator: Prashant.Akolia@ness-usa.com
text:
We have Tomcat 4.1.27 installed on Windows 2000 server running as service mode 
with MS IIS. When Tomcat service is enabled, Tomcat is using almost 100% CPU 
and memory usage in ideal condition. 
I tried to run Tomcat as application mode (from command prompt) then it runs 
fine with very minimum usage of CPU and Memory.

Could you please shate what could be the reason and if there is any solution? 
Is there any bug with this version?

Thanks in advance,

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
Bugzilla is not a forum for asking questions. Please use the tomcat-user mailing
list.
